sentences: Paul Norris Bollenback (born June 6, 1959) is a jazz guitarist who has appeared on Entertainment Tonight, The Tonight Show, The Today Show, Joan Rivers, and Good Morning America.
Bollenback lived in India with his family when he was 11.
After three years, the family returned to the U.S. and Bollenback began listening to rock music.
He cites his discovery of Miles Davis as a pivotal moment in his life.
He attended the University of Miami.
In 1997, he began teaching at American University.
